title: Art of the Persian carpet
brief_description: Depicts the entire process of creating Persian carpets, from preparing and dyeing the wool, through the intricate symbolic design patterns, to the complex handwork where young weavers tie up to three million knots to complete one carpet. Shows the remote Indian tribes who weave the finest carpets. Suitable for Upper Secondary students.
